name: Deltatile
description:
In Deltatile you can swap 2 tiles based on the current position of the ball and the last position where a swap occured.



Throughout 65 levels you will have to creatively use this mechanic to reach the goal.



Key Features:


  • 65 levels
  • 6 worlds, each with unique challenges
  • Original Soundtrack

Usability Features:


  • Full Screen/Windowed mode
  • Resolution settings
  • Music and SFX control with seperate sliders
  • Rebindable hotkeys
  • Various 3D related settings
  • Unlimited undo
  • Unlimited level skipping
  • No timer
Mouse and Keyboard is required to play this game.
